org.netbeans.modules.parsing.spi.indexing

Class SuspendStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.parsing.spi.indexing.SuspendStatus

  • public final class SuspendStatus
extends Object
    A service for indexers to check if an indexing is suspended or to park while indexing is suspended. The indexing is suspended by the infrastructure when high priority request like index query or execution of UserTask, ParserResultTask is in progress. The instance of the SuspendStatus can be obtained from Context.getSuspendStatus(). The infrastructure suspends indexing automatically. The EmbeddingIndexers are suspended with a file granularity. The CustomIndexers are suspended with a source root granularity. This service can be used for more fine granularity suspending especially for CustomIndexers.
    Since:
    1.52

      • isSuspendSupported

        public boolean isSuspendSupported()
        Checks if a indexing task supports suspend.
        Returns:
        true if suspend is supported by the active indexing task.
        Since:
        1.78

      • isSuspended

        public boolean isSuspended()
        Checks if an indexing is suspended.
        Returns:
        true if an indexing is suspended.

      • parkWhileSuspended

        public void parkWhileSuspended()
                        throws InterruptedException
        Parks a current (caller) thread while an indexing is suspended. Threading: The caller should not hold any locks when calling this method.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the caller is interrupted.
